scripts.ajbpf-v2: cucumber-js --retry 1 --tags '@ajbpf-v2' --require cucumber.js --require features/**/*.js --format json:reports/cucumber_report.json --format html:./reports/cucumber_report.html --format summary --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --no-strict --publish-quiet
